text: Shippers of Briana DeJesus and Javi Marroquin only had a few months to celebrate the reality romance before these Teen Mom 2 stars called it quits. So why did Javi and Briana break up? Bri said their futures ` ` didn't line up,'' and that explanation would have been frustratingly vague if she had stopped there. But then Bri got much more specific, saying he didn't approve of her going under the knife. ` ` Javi and I are not together anymore,'' Briana told Blasting News in January. ` ` Our future just doesn't line up.
